author: Benjamin Disraeli
message: The greatest good you can do for another is not just share your riches, but reveal to them their own.
title: Thought of the day

author: Buddha
message: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
title: Thought of the day

message: Peace of mind is not the absence of conflict from life, but the ability to cope with it.
title: Thought of the day

author: Helen Keller
message: Face your deficiencies and acknowledge them; but do not let them master you. Let them teach you patience, sweetness, insight.
title: Thought of the day
